text: Bomberman Land Touch! (Touch! Bomberman Land DS in Japan) is a Puzzle/Mini- game collection video game made by Hudson Soft and published by Hudson Soft, Atlus, Rising Star Games, Red Ant Enterprises and Nintendo in many different places for the Nintendo DS game console. ==Other websites== * Official English page * European page * Official page at Hudson Soft's Japan Website * Nintendo of Korea page * Official Bomberman Land website Category:2006 video games Category:Atlus games Land Touch! Category:Crossover video games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo DS-only games Category:Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection games Category:Party video games Category:Puzzle video games Category:Video games about pirates Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Bomberman Land Touch!
